history.content:
Lost your internship this summer due to Covid-19? Interested in working at a high-growth blockchain startup?

The Berkeley Blockchain Xcelerator invites you to apply to our portfolio companies through our new hiring page! Berkeley Blockchain Xcelerator is a joint venture by three premier organizations on the UC Berkeley campus – Berkeley Engineering (SCET), the Berkeley Haas School of Business, and Blockchain at Berkeley.

We have open positions in Software Engineering, Product Management, UI/UX Design, Business Development / Marketing, Finance, and Research. All you need to do is fill in a few lines of information, add your resume, and your profile will be shared with our 30+ portfolio companies looking to hire summer interns!

Link to Application: https://airtable.com/shrAWdmVzOsxJdQlL
Link to Xcelerator Site: https://www.xcelerator.berkeley.edu/
history.subject: Berkeley Blockchain Xcelerator Summer Internship Portal
